Comment.value:
On obtaining the Dark Wind.

XP:
[XP_Wizard_01] 10% for discovery                                                     [en_trig_wizard]
[XP_Wizard_02] 10% for learning of the Shadovar from Dagger Filth  [a_dagget_shadov]
[XP_Wizard_03] 10% for first use of Shadow Portal                            [us_shadowportal]
[XP_Wizard_04] 10% for entering High Arcanist's Chambers              [en_wizard_04]
[XP_Wizard_05] 10% for finding Portable Door                                   [acq_moduleitem]
[XP_Wizard_06] 10% for entering Lair of the Shadow Lich                 [en_wizard_05]
[XP_Wizard_07] 30% for obtaining Dark Wind                                    [acq_moduleitem]
[XP_Wizard_08] 10% for learning of Shadow Store.                           [a_shadserv_store]
Learning of the Shadovar from Dagget Filth
On observing the cutscene where the Shadow Lich steals the Dark Wind.

On earning your limited freedom from Ashtara.

XP:
[XP_Ashtara_01] 10% for obtaining ring                                  [acq_moduleitem]
[XP_Ashtara_02] 3% per golem destroyed (30% maximum)      [ud_guardiangolem]
[XP_Ashtara_03] 5% per golem deactivated (50% maximum)   [ud_guardiangolem]
[XP_Ashtara_04] 30% for gaining freedom from Ashtara          [a_ashtara_towers]
On destroying a golem (through either combat or the ring).
On destroying a golem through use of the ring.
On hearing one of the golem's advertisements.
On hearing the Stone Butler's confession

On acquiring the Dead Wind.

XP:
[XP_Crypt_01] 10% for discovery.                                                   [en_trig_crypt]
[XP_Crypt_02] 2% per Dread Sarcophagus destroyed (16% total)   [dt_dreadsarcoph]
[XP_Crypt_03] 4% for obtaining key to exit 1st Lvl                           [acq_moduleitem]
[XP_Crypt_04] 10% for exiting 2nd Lvl                                             [op_crypt2_crypt3]
[XP_Crypt_05] 2% per side room entered on 3rd Lvl (20% total)       [en_mazeroom]
[XP_Crypt_06] 10% for exiting 3rd Lvl                                              [op_crypt3_crypt4]
[XP_Crypt_07] 30% for obtaining Dead Wind                                  [acq_moduleitem]

Killing Heurodis

XP:
[XP_Main_01] 10% for discovering the Temple                                                       [en_winds_05]
[XP_Main_02] 4% for learning of the Mythallar                                                         [a_mythallar / acq_moduleitem]
[XP_Main_03] 6% for learning of the Three Winds                                                  [a_three_winds / acq_moduleitem]
[XP_Main_04] 10% for unsealing the Temple                                                          [cl_arkofwinds]
[XP_Main_05] 8% for Lvl 1 (details pending revision of level)                                  [   ]
[XP_Main_06] 2% per Lvl 2 golem (8% total)                                                            [ud_pillargolem_e / ud_pillargolem_n / ud_pillargolem_s / ud_pillargolem_w]
[XP_Main_07] 2% per Lvl 3 lever (8% total)                                                             [us_winds3levers]
[XP_Main_08] 5% for placing meat on the altar for the first time                              [cl_meataltar]
[XP_Main_09] 6% for finding Heurodis                                                                    [a_heurodisattack]
[XP_Main_10] 15% for destroying active mythallar (-1% per inactive destroyed)      [dt_mythallar]
[XP_Main_11] 20% for killing Heurodis / ending game.                                           [ud_heurodis]
On speaking with Heurodis before the final battle.
On learning of the Mythallar, the temple, etc (as in that's where she's likely to be).

On acquiring the Wise Wind.

XP:
[XP_Library_01] 10% for discovery                                            [en_trig_library]
[XP_Library_02] 4% for reading Romance Novel                       [a_romancenovel]
[XP_Library_03] 7% for obtaining Quill Pen                                [acq_moduleitem]
[XP_Library_04] 4% for reading Hell Treatise                             [a_helltreatise]
[XP_Library_05] 7% for obtaining Inkwell                                   [acq_moduleitem]
[XP_Library_06] 4% for reading Karsus' Confession                   [a_penitance]
[XP_Library_07] 5% for rewriting Romance Novel                      [a_tome_rewrite]
[XP_Library_08] 5% for gaining William's Promise                       [a_william_joins]
[XP_Library_09] 5% for rewriting Hell Treatise                            [a_tome_rewrite]
[XP_Library_10] 5% for gaining Karsus' Promise                        [a_karsus_joins]
[XP_Library_11] 14% for writing "The Catching of the Wind"    [a_catching_write]
[XP_Library_12] 30% for obtaining the Wise Wind                    [acq_moduleitem]
On acquiring the quill pen from the Grand Matron's corpse.
On speaking with William the Blind.
On writing story into blank book.
On first hearing of the Three Winds (Butler / Dagget / William / Karsus)
